title: Is there a book that can completely change my life by inspiring me to start working hard toward success and to solve all my problems? - Quora

response.answer_text: Alchemist by Paulo Coelho , Here you will ‘feel’ the connection between human mind and universe. The beauty of this book is its spiritual contents.Think and Grow rich by Napolean Hill, The main attractive feature about this book is that it imposes its philosophies to the reader by pointing towards the real life examples who were suceeded in their ‘Road less travelled journey’. Actually this book is plotted on the basis of years of research and it will surely offers you a better experience .The Monk who sells the Ferrari by Robin sharma ,This books tells you highly effective methods to purify your mind , body and soul.The Art of War by Sun tzu - This book will definitely gonna help you in day to day life in the areas of decision making and helps executing it in a very productive manner.

Yes, there are few books that may encourage you and which will give you another perspective of life towards your goal. The Alchemist by Paul CoelhoRich Dad Poor Dad by Robert KiyosakiLife Without Limits by Nick VujicicThe Monk Who Sold His Ferrari by Robin SharmaHow To Get From Where You Are To Where You Want To Be by Jack CanfieldJust make sure you read this books with massive intrest and try to relate things with your life. And implementations are must. Miracles about to happen! Wish you Good Luck!
